biotools.summary: A tool for the prediction of ancestry in cattle | Added an avenue for data that plink does not have a "species ID" for. In this case users, will specify "NA" as the plink_species_ID in their input file. It is now required to specify chromosome number for the data in the input | CRUMBLER has now been successfully ran in Pigs, following these updates

bioschemas.name: CRUMBLER
